content: OpenDOAR Repositories - Ghana http://www.opendoar.org Selected records from the OpenDOAR Directory of Open Access Repositories for Ghana en-GB 2015-03-20T01:38:46Z SHERPA, University of Nottingham OpenDOAR Database RSS Feed Generator OpenDOAR Logo http://www.opendoar.org/images/OpenDOAR.png http://www.opendoar.org/ University of Cape Coast Institutional Repository URL:http://ir.ucc.edu.gh/dspace/ Organisation:University of Cape Coast, Ghana Description:this is the institutional repository of the University of Cape Coast. The interface is in English. Software:DSpace Size:1390 items (2015-03-03) Subjects:Multidisciplinary; Agriculture, Food and Veterinary; Biology and Biochemistry; Physics and Astronomy; Health and Medicine; Arts and Humanities General; Social Sciences General Content:Articles; Theses; Unpublished; Learning Objects Languages:English Policies:Metadata re-use permitted for not-for-profit purposes; Full data item policies unknown; Content policies unknown; Submission policies defined; Preservation policies explicitly undefined Date Added:2013-09-10 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=2794&format=full 2013-09-10T16:51:56Z University of Ghana Digital Collection (UGSpace) URL:http://ugspace.ug.edu.gh/ Organisation:University of Ghana, Ghana Description:This site provides access to the collections of the institution. Users may set up RSS and Atom feeds to be alerted to new content. Collection includes works from the colonial era (1470-1958), including Dutch publications, Folio and Furley collections. Software:DSpace Size:4382 items (2015-03-03) Subjects:History and Archaeology Content:Books; Special Languages:English; Dutch Policies:Metadata re-use policy explicitly undefined; Full data item policies explicitly undefined; Content policies explicitly undefined; Submission policies explicitly undefined; Preservation policies explicitly undefined Date Added:2012-02-28 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=2430&format=full 2012-02-28T16:16:17Z knustspace URL:http://dspace.knust.edu.gh:8080/jspui/ Organisation:Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST), Ghana Description:This site provides access to the research output of the institution. Many items are not available as full-text. The interface is in English. The site may be slow in downloading selected items. OAI-PMH:http://dspace.knust.edu.gh:8080/oai/request Software:DSpace Size:5916 items (2014-07-23) Subjects:Multidisciplinary Content:Articles; References; Conferences; Theses Languages:English Policies:Metadata re-use policy explicitly undefined; Full data item policies explicitly undefined; Content policies explicitly undefined; Submission policies explicitly undefined; Preservation policies explicitly undefined Date Added:2009-11-04 ]]> http://www.opendoar.org/find.php?rID=1649&format=full 2009-11-04T13:13:32Z
